content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently producing copper plates.

### Wooden chest at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 0.5)) currently containing copper plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. For example, you received an error when trying to insert copper ore into the furnace when you had none in your inventory.

### Errors when inserting items into an entity that cannot accept them
- Make sure to check if there is a nearby entity that can accept the items you are trying to insert. You received an error when attempting to insert copper plates into a furnace that was not configured to accept them.

### Errors when trying to set a recipe on a non-existent entity
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to set a recipe on exists and is correctly referenced. You received an error when trying to set the recipe for a new furnace that was not created.

### Errors when attempting to place an entity without it being in inventory
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it. You received an error when trying to place a wooden chest without having it in your inventory.

### Errors when crafting an item due to missing sub-ingredients
- Gather all required sub-ingredients before attempting to craft an item. You received an error when trying to craft a wooden chest without having the necessary wood.

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Check that the target entity's inventory has enough space to accept the items you are trying to insert.
